::KitKat2::
She heard the call to arms and cursed under her breath. "OH great, 
now what?"  She started running up the stairs and towards the bridge.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Havoc/Zardus::
> 
> Havoc walks into the CR room, approaching Zardus and reporting the
> Maximals' talk with Megaton. Zardus frowns.
> 
> "Hmm. Allright. If the Maximals are making alliances with other
> factions, we might have a problem. We want them to be hit with
> everyone's weapons."
> 
> He frowns, thinking for a while but is interrupted by the scanners
> reporting that a large amount of bots were heading this way (the
> Decepticons would have to pass near Alliance island to get to the 
CF).
> 
> "Alliance bots," he says over the comm, "Prepare for battle."
> 
> The shields activate and the weapons arm themselves, preparing to 
slag
> anyone attacking. The scanners lock onto the bots' signatures,
> tracking them and predicting possible destinations.
> 
>
